metadata.title: CVE-2021-47524 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: serial:liteuart: fix minor-number leak on probe errors Make sure to release theallocated minor number before returning on probe errors.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
